# Web Chat

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/help-articles/web-chat/

## Category
11 Automated Flows And Messages

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
WEB CHAT
Web Chat

Engage with your website visitors in real time through a live web chat. Turn website visitors into new clients by answering questions, sharing photos, and building trust from the first interaction.

Manage chat messages through Mangomint: Set up notifications for new chat messages and reply directly through Mangomint.

Customize your chat window: Show a custom welcome message when your chat window is opened & let users know your estimated response time.

Follow up via text: Allow users to enter their phone number if they prefer to be contacted directly.

The articles in this section cover how to enable web chat, reply to web chat messages, and more.

Note: 

Web chat is included with our Connect add-on. Billing users can go to the Subscription page to manage subscription add-ons.

In this section:
Enabling Web Chat
Receiving Web Chat Messages
Replying to Web Chat Messages
FAQ: Web Chat
Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
